Posts.Content: lmbrickey wrote: Hello, My name is Leshia, seems like i can NOT recover emotionally...i am depressed way to much, my husband is home with me all the time. i need some alone time and he talks his head off about things that happened years ago all all the time..we have been married for 5 yrs..and he still wants to "talk talk talk about what happened over over and over again about everything from a to z..he loves to tell me every single detail of what he does and likes my attention..like a kid he gets upset if i don't listen..i have listened OUT..I feel bad but am Cancer FREE for 2 yrs.. i no we spend to much time together..however i am not well enough to GO GO GO..or LISTEN LISTEN TO ME!! he doesn't even know how bad he is..he goes into details of a car he had when he was 20 some..oh we are..49/50 yrs old people here..ha ha..about the car i no every detail to the very moment he laid his eyes on it...i may be in the wrong place addh add ocd bipolar i have studied it all..cancer is hard but living w/him day in and day out..he loves me to be w/him all all the time..remember this..and explains stuff..i knew when i was a kid..he is intellengent..but so am I..so why can't i get it though his head i can hear i NO..you told me a thousand time already! HAD enough plzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz HELP ME BEFORE I DROWNED... leshia burton Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: dealing with life after breast cancer lmbrickey justjudie

Posts.Content: Jul 17, 2011 10:04AM lmbrickey wrote: hi chrissy, i have talked until im blue in the face.. he just does not see himself rumbling on and on..bout stuff i have heard so so many times..over and over and over...oh i don't hold back that's the prob..he don't see IT...and a theorpist is out of my price and driving range or i would be in the HOT SEAT With Pleasure.., HOW are u doing?? do u hear this much...my second time on..sorry i sound so self centered..just at my wit ends................................:_( tears..
Posts.Title: dealing with life after breast cancer lmbrickey justjudie

Posts.Content: Jun 15, 2011 06:57AM lmbrickey wrote: so u r happy a feel very good w/no hotflashes that itch your whole body and sweat drips from my ears nose and eyes until i have to use eye meds..my doctor won't see me any more w/o insurance..my husband is laid off we get unemployment..and i do take paxil and nerve pill..i have a new family dr..at a small outreach clinic w/sliding fee..but not proper treatment..3 yrs and i haven't been tested since my breast even..no one what's a broke patient..we don't have free clinics what we do have is still very expensive..i would love a theropist but that is like asking for a new house..i would have to travel 100 miles just to get s/o that would even listen..around here they just talk about u behind your back..if u go to health dept..for nerves..now what??
Posts.Title: so tired of feeling bad lmbrickey Foxlairfrm

Posts.Content: lmbrickey wrote: this is my 1st post..wanting help with handling the emotional passage after stage 4..2 yrs cancer free..but still so very very weary how can i get my get up and go back?? leshia burton Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: so tired of feeling bad lmbrickey Foxlairfrm

Posts.Content: Jul 17, 2011 09:55AM lmbrickey wrote: thank u sweetie..i wish i was not so angry..but how did i go from being outgoing and loving life..to dreading to even get out of bed..am i a (PITY PARTY)...i feel like i need to be alone and work it out one day at a time..but my husband wants attention all the time..well JUST Mine..i love him w/all my heart...but i am so exhusted just to hear him go on and on about thing that are never goin to happen or what has happened for the blue million th time is driving me to the NUT house..got any advise for this..?? x0x0x leshia♥
Posts.Title: so tired of feeling bad lmbrickey Foxlairfrm

Posts.Content: Jun 15, 2011 07:02AM lmbrickey wrote: I have done that yoga walks mediatate have my dog and husband..and take paxil and nerve pills..i shake like i freezing to death..then all at the same time it's a big HOTFLASH to seers all though my body and peirces my heart w/a deep depressing feeling..like after a loved one passes away..have u had baby blues or real bad pms where u couldn't get out of the bed? thanks 4 your help anyway..
Posts.Title: so tired of feeling bad lmbrickey Foxlairfrm

Posts.Content: Jul 17, 2011 09:47AM lmbrickey wrote: oh thank u so much...i am on anti depressants..pain pills and a nerve pill...but my big problem really is being w/my husband every day,,,,day in and day out..he has been laid off and got the extention..over a yr now..he could talk all all day and never ever gets tired of being with me..it drain what energy i do have hearing his long winded non meaningfull (to me) stories..cars..right down to how the lights are made..under the hood..oh gosh..i no every part now..he loves to tell me stuff i already no..over and over.. (OH HE DON"T believe ME) cause he do see it..i can record him and he still just don't see he is smothering me and it hold me back from dealing w/this new and very diffifcult time of OUR lives..NOW WHAT, Mazy? am i the one being childish?
Posts.Title: so tired of feeling bad lmbrickey Foxlairfrm
